params.name: location.reload()
params.code:
<script>

async function getData () {
  const res = await fetch('https://dog.ceo/api/breeds/image/random')
  const json = await res.json()
  log(json)
}
  
getData()
  
</script>
params.text: This example demonstrates the simplest and most modern way to request data from a third party REST API. Here we simply log the data, but in the examples below we use the message property (which contains a URL to a random dog image) to create an image of a random dog and add it to our page.
